General.Name: Sabio Holdings Inc
General.Description: Sabio Holdings Inc. operates as a technology provider in the advertising areas of connected TV (CTV) and over-the-top (OTT) streaming in the United States. The company offers targeted campaign solutions to agencies and brands by filling ad slots in CTV/OTT apps; and operates an agnostic platform to track, measure, and analyse media buys. The company is headquartered in Encino, California.
General.Address: 16350 Ventura Boulevard, Encino, CA, United States, 91436
